fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Trap!:**Set a trap up at a player's house; the next player to visit them will get dealt a powerfull attack. If they live the attack, you become there alignment.(1 use)
**Mount**: Give the selected player a mount, converting them into your alignment, then giving them the ability to multitask.(1 use)
**Collect Bone**: Give the minecraft(head) one bone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you die, give the minecraft(head) one bone.
**Loyalty**: When you switch alignments, you may not out members of the Minecraft faction.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear.
